channel.title: Make d bow hit from distance +add arrows?
channel.description:
well in my server, to use a bow, u have to go beside the npc or person to attack.. how do i make it so u can shoot farther
so i dont gotta stand by npc while i shoot with bow
i wanna stay a couple coords over..... any help?
[hr]
d bow shoots with no ammo.... how do i make their ammo and make it dragon arrows
